comment: I took her SCI 1101 class during the summer, and the units are very fast paced and workload heavy. As long as you are capable on being accountable with yourself and do the labs and work, there is minimal stress. This class is about teaching yourself on whatever is provided for a module.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: I do not know why Dr. Eugene is rated so low. Yes, this class is challenging. There are labs once a week, and normally a test every 2 weeks. It is a very fast course, but it is very manageable. The people who did not attend class for labs struggled the most. The labs are very time-consuming, but go to class and she will answer any questions.

Did not have to attend her lectures at all, either way she did not have a microphone so it was impossible to understand what she is saying. I would say this class is very easy, she isn't a tough grader at all, also she isn't very good with replying back to emails. This course is all about self teaching yourself.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Test heavy

comment: Take her if you want an easy A!! Everything is online, went to this class maybe 3 times. There's a lab and a lab quiz every week that has lockdown. She doesn't grade the lab worksheets, though. Homework is really easy. Tests are on lockdown browser, but if you do the Kahoots before taking the test, you'll be fine. Quizzes are lockdown too.
Stopped showing up to class after the second week when I realized everything was online. Labs every week, they were annoying, but easy. Exams are proctored on lockdown browser.

I am not exaggerating when I say that I've never attended a class this semester. ALL the work is on D2L; basically an online class, so lectures were kinda unnecessary. Grading system and syllabus was unorganized; I emailed for verification and her response didn't help. There are exams, quizzes, homework, and writing assignments. Gives extra credit.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: I mean my review is nothing new. It's an easy class but don't expect to get a response from her after the first few weeks of class. I stopped going after week 1 and got a good grade. Be aware of MMES homework because she often won't put the due date in D2L or Pulse or she'll put in the wrong date. I took her for both 1101 & 02 so just be prepared.

All reviews are accurate. It takes weeks for an email response about a very simple question. Every test/quiz is lockdown. She reads literally word for word off the ppt slides that are from the publisher. All the material on tests are only from the book so the lectures are useless. Also, the syllabus doesn't reflect the assignments given in class.

This professor is simply not good in my opinion. Attendance was not mandatory. She uses a lockdown browser +webcam for tests AND quizzes. If you do not read the textbook you will not pass. If you like to study off of PowerPoint then good luck to you. If you are looking for an easy A then do not take this professor. Her lectures are also very boring
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: All reviews are bad but other than her boring teaching methods, this is an easy class. Lab quiz once a week and test every 3-4 chapters on lockdown. You do not need to try in the labs, I studied for her test maybe an hour or so out of the week and did fine.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Only gives one 10 question quiz a week for grading and it's not even based on what she's attempting to try and teach us in class.

EVERY review ive read on here is 100% accurate so please know EVERYTHING IS TRUE. No attendance, just reads off the pp thats on d2l. tests are on lockdown. never had a single interaction with her the whole year. she never had a good energy. at least not one good enough for me to come to class. unless u like teaching yourself, i wouldnt take her.

Do not take her she's entirely boring and she reads off a powerpoint the entire lecture which she also uploads on D2L. You really just teach yourself everything. The labs aren't too difficult but they just take so much time. All of her exams are on a lockdown browser but her quizzes are not. There's a lab quiz every week. I don't recommend her.

I had little interaction with the professor during this course and felt that it was mostly just teaching myself. Assignments were easy; in fact, you didn't have to do the labs unless you wanted a deeper understanding for the tests. Tests and such were easy but assignments were time-consuming. If you want an easy A, I recommend Dr. Eugene.

Nice professor. Attendance is not taken, you could honestly just do the work at home. Lecture from a powerpoint, easy but time consuming online labs, then a lab and module quiz each week. Easy tests with kahoot reviews. Offers extra credit 2/3 times. Has homework for each unit. Easy class if you do the work!

I wish I never took her. Her lectures are discussion based so you do not really learn anything. So when the test and quiz comes around, nobody knows it. She does not know what shes talking about. She reminds me of whenever youre in a group project and one person does all the work but everyone has to present but they havent looked at the ppt.

This class was useless to my learning despite my consistent attendance.She did not have the students best interests at heart & assigned ridiculously difficult exams and quizzes that did not reflect what had been discussed in class.I wasted my time in this course. She seems like a nice person, but as a professor I would not recommend her at all.
